C

changeDisplayer(LedDisplayer) - Method in class displayer.DisplayerController
change the controlled displayer

D

displayer - package displayer
 
DisplayerController - Class in displayer
 
DisplayerController(LedDisplayer) - Constructor for class displayer.DisplayerController
 
DisplayerMain - Class in displayer
 
DisplayerMain() - Constructor for class displayer.DisplayerMain
 
DisplayerWithLatency - Class in displayer
A DisplayerWithLatency diplays a message on a screen of limited width and a latency between the first and the last character of the message.
DisplayerWithLatency(int, int) - Constructor for class displayer.DisplayerWithLatency
build a displayer with a screen of width characters and a given latency

G

getMessage() - Method in class displayer.LedDisplayer
get the (full) message of this displayer
getScreenWidth() - Method in class displayer.LedDisplayer
get this screen's width

L

LedDisplayer - Class in displayer
A LedDisplayer diplays a message on a screen of limited width.
LedDisplayer(int) - Constructor for class displayer.LedDisplayer
build a displayer with a screen of width characters
LeftRightDisplayer - Class in displayer
A LedDisplayer diplays a message on a screen of limited width.
LeftRightDisplayer(int) - Constructor for class displayer.LeftRightDisplayer

S

screenWidth - Variable in class displayer.LedDisplayer
 
setMessage(String) - Method in class displayer.DisplayerWithLatency
set the new message to display, a call to textOnScreen() is now blank until next shift() First character of message will enter on the right at next shift() .
setMessage(String) - Method in class displayer.LedDisplayer
set the new message to display, a call to textOnScreen() is now blank until next shift() First character of message will enter on the right at next shift() .
setMessage(String) - Method in class displayer.UpperCaseDisplayer
set the new message to display, a call to textOnScreen() is now blank until next shift() First character (witch is capitalized) of message will enter on the right at next shift() .
shift() - Method in class displayer.LedDisplayer
shift message by one character : first character on the left disappears, next character from message is added on the right
shift() - Method in class displayer.SpeedDisplayer
shift message by one character : first character on the left disappears, next character from message is added on the right
SpeedDisplayer - Class in displayer
A SpeedDisplayer diplays a message on a screen of limited width with a certain latency and speed.
SpeedDisplayer(int, int, int) - Constructor for class displayer.SpeedDisplayer
build a displayer with a screen of width characters, a given latency and speed

T

textOnScreen() - Method in class displayer.LedDisplayer
return the text that appears on the screen, it is always composed of getScreenWidth() characters
textOnScreen() - Method in class displayer.LeftRightDisplayer
return the reverse of the text that should appears on the screen, it is always composed of getScreenWidth() characters
tryIt(String, int) - Method in class displayer.DisplayerController
use the displayer with given message for nbTics steps

U

UpperCaseDisplayer - Class in displayer
A UpperCaseDisplayer diplays a message on a screen of limited width with all characters that are capitalized.
UpperCaseDisplayer(int) - Constructor for class displayer.UpperCaseDisplayer
build a displayer with a screen of width characters
